SFIN.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "SAFMAR Financial investments"
SFIN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂSAFMAR Financial investmentsÂ, an investment holding company, primarily operates as a leasing company in Russia. The company leases vehicles, including passenger cars; light-duty and heavy-duty commercial vehicles, MCVs, and trailers; self-propelled machines; buses; and other assets, as well as provides related aftermarket services. It also offers non-governmental pension funds; corporate and individual pension insurance; life and property, motor, and health insurance products; and POS lending services. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
